data.name: Shred & Tear: Explosive Kajun
data.detailed_description:
Check this out!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1622110/Zoria_and_the_Cursed_Land/


It's saucy time! - Dev Blogs


Greeting ladies & gentlemen!

It's saucy time is our work-in-progress dev blog for Shred & Tear! Update the latest news in our EVENTS & ANNOUNCEMENTS section. We are up for any questions from you guys ٩(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)۶


About the Game



Fellow men of cultures (and ladies)!

SHRED & TEAR: Explosive Kajun!


Bad news! The alien empire TEABAG (Tentamon Enslaved & Astronautic Bio Armed Galatica) has invaded Earth. Our heroine, Kajun-chan, is their test subject turned bio-weapon for mass destruction and it is up to us to unshackle Kajun-chan from captivity and fight back the TEABAG’s invasion.

  • Fast and Brutal
    Prepare yourself for constant adrenaline rushes with Shred and Tear’s Push-Forward gameplay as Kajun-chan tears through hordes of Tentamons in relentless and surreal Hack n’ Slash fashion.

  • Sexy & Agressive
    Don’t be distracted by Kajun’s body (we know it’s a challenge) as combat is easy to learn but hard to master. With speed and brutality, the gameplay demands quick reflexes and constant situational awareness to succeed.

  • SHRED AND TEAR!!!
    Armed with an arsenal of deadly skills and weapons, Kajun-chan is ready for the carnage stronger, faster and sexier than ever.

  • Extra thick fan service
    Witness Kajun-chan’s extra thick fan-service amidst the adrenaline-filled gory battles and eye-candy QTEs ;)

    Get yourself up, Kajun-chan is waiting for you!
